mapper.select: SELECT chat_id , seller_id , buyer_id , seller_nick , buyer_nick , seller_profile , buyer_profile , chat_room.registerd_id , room_name , date_last , time_last FROM chat_room, book_selling WHERE (chat_room.registerd_id = book_selling.registerd_id) AND chat_id = #{chat_id}
